sub_title: Amsterdam UMC University Medical Centers / AMC and VUmc)
summary:
Johan Maessen can be characterized as a straightforward Dutch with emphatic skills who is capable of organizing and motivating people. Johan has experience in managing, transforming and implementing services, technology by using Prince2, Agile  and continuous improvement techniques.

Johan has many years of experience with programmes and projects in larger international (Tata Steel and Royal KPN)  and Hospital (Amsterdam UMC AMC and VUmc) organisations.

Characteristics and skills:
-	Johan is able to bring the out of control into control.
-	Stakeholder management in larger projects and programs.
-	Organizational/ political sensitive within larger and international organisations.
-	Team builder and manager motivating and managing  people.
-	Empathic skills
-	Analytical skills.
-	Commercial skills

Specialisations
Interim / transition / program / project management and consultancy related to:
-	I.T. infrastructure programs and projects by means of Agile/ Scrum and  Prince2 methods.
-	Telecom and data network infrastructures with  multiple vendors.
-	Service management systems and processes.
-	Management and selection of service providers.
-	Installations and mechanical engineering.
-	Building programs and projects.
-	Quality assurance and continuous improvement.
-	Hospital environments. (Epic, Chipsoft etc.)
-	Operating room systems.(K2, K3 cleanroom)
-	Storz (OR1) and Olympus (Endo Alpha)
-	Marketing projects.
-	Change management.

Methods
-     IPMA C International Project Management Association
-     Prince2 Practitioner
-     Agile, Scrum
-     ITIL
-     MSP Managing Successful programs

school.name: Lincoln International Business School - University of Lincoln

profile_positions.description:
As Project- Program Manager: Projects and advice for Academic Medical Center (AMC) and VU University Medical Center (VU MC):

- New build of the complete infrastructure and functional contents build of an Epic system for Amstelland Hospital with all infrastructure aspects in two datacenters and at location Amstelland Ziekenhuis. Responsible for all aspects of program and project management.

- New build of the hardware and infrastructure over 6 data centers of the Amsterdam UMC Epic electronic patient dossier workflow system and migration from IBM AIX to Linux/ ESX platform. Including hardware and supplier selection and RFQ. Budget: € 2M +

- Renewal of the complete network infrastructure of access layer and datacenters of Amsterdam UMC consisting of  upgrading an renewal of 300 MER/SER for 39000 outlets including partial building cabling and all infrastucture of 2 Datacenters. Including hardware and suplier selection and RFQ. Budget € 25M+ 1 Year project

- Program Hospital Operations Center(5 year program).: New build of 22 K3 clean rooms/ technical infrastructure and systems (Storz (OR1) and Olympus (Endo Alpha) Budget 30M+ (3 Year project)

- Building new Amsterdam UMC emergency room. 2 Year project

- Renewals and upgrades of the ERP and  personal health record (PHR) systems and all adjacent infrastructure and systems . Epic and adjacent systems. 1 year project.

- Several I.T. infrastructure projects during the period:
  . Replacement / lifecycle of Linux Rhel5 Rhel6 systems (200 servers)
  . Development and Rollout of a 8800 Citrix workspaces and VM-Ware ESX back-end system. 
  . Renewal of the MS Active Directory AD infrastructure.
  . Renewal of various hospital and I.T. systems.
  . Windows 2003 and 2008 server lifecycle replacement.
     and similar projects.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager / Program Manager
